description: Monitor DLL/PE file events, specifically creation of these binary files as well as the loading of .NET assemblies into processes. Look for image loads that are not recognized or not normally loaded into a process.(Citation: PenTestLabs AppDomainManagerInject)(Citation: Rapid7 AppDomain Manager Injection)

external_references.description: Administrator. (2020, May 26). APPDOMAINMANAGER INJECTION AND DETECTION. Retrieved March 28, 2024.
Spagnola, N. (2023, May 5). AppDomain Manager Injection: New Techniques For Red Teams. Retrieved March 29, 2024.
